titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection includes family papers compiled by Andrew A. Youngman, of Sunbury, Pennsylvania. Materials include: narrative family history (includes reminiscences on life in Sunbury); notes; estate papers and probate records; correspondence; clippings and printed materials about family members and Sunbury institutions; photographs of buildings and family members; personal memorabilia; and a small number of printed materials related to speeches given in the U.S. Senate.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
